entry.title: neuherbs Omega Steel-Cut Oats
entry.summary:
Vendor: Neuherbs
Type:
Price: 179.00 - 399.00 (2 variants)

Get yourself a wholesome satisfying breakfast cereal that can help you keep active throughout the day. neuherbs introduces Omega Steel-Cut Oats which are 100% natural and clean, providing you all the health benefits of healthy oats along with added omega-3, making it extraordinary.

Delivery: Products are usually delivered in 2-5 days.

Offers: 10% Off on all products. Code: EXTRA10

Offers: 15% Off on Orders Above Rs.1499. Code: NEU15

— Key Benefits —

  • Good For Heart

    Omega Steel-Cut Oats comes with added support of omega-3. Omega-3 is mainly popular for it's function of managing bad cholesterol levels. Also, oats are naturally low in sodium.

  • Good For Weight Management

    With the richness of beta-glucans, oats help you in managing weight by slowing down gut emptying, that keeps you feel full for longer.

  • Good For Blood Sugar Management

    Oats comes under the category of low glycemic foods, which means it helps manage instant spike of blood sugar levels post-meal.

— Key Ingredients —

  • Steel-Cut Oats

    To provide you a natural wholesome food

  • Zero added sugar

    To deliver superior quality food.

  • Naturally-gluten free

    To support your weight management journey.

— How To Use —

  • Add seasonal vegetables & spices of your choice and prepare a delicious breakfast bowl of masala porridge

  • Enjoy a delightful bowl of sweet steel-cut porridge with fruits, nuts berries & many more

  • Relish the nutritious & appetizing steel-cut oats

  • Can it be given to children?

    Yes, neuherbs Omega Steel-Cut Oats can be enjoyed by children in any form: sweet or savory according to their likes.

  • What is the shelf-life of the product?

    neuherbs Omega Steel-Cut Oats are best before 12 months from the date of packaging

  • Is it gluten-free?

    Yes, neuherbs Omega Steel-Cut Oats are naturally gluten-free.

  • In what kind of packaging does it come?

    It comes in a monocarton pack with a zip lock poly- pouch to avoid moisture & maintain freshness.

  • From which source omega-3 has been extracted?

    Omega-3 has been taken from unroasted chia seeds, which is a natural plant-based source of omega-3.

  • Is it flavoured?

    No, neuherbs Omega Steel-Cut Oats has their own natural taste & doesn't have any added flavour.

  • Is this masala oats?

    No, these are natural plain steel cut oats which you can prepare according to your taste preference.

entry.title: neuherbs Omega Instant Oats
entry.summary:
Vendor: Neuherbs
Type:
Price: 149.00 - 349.00 (2 variants)

Say hello to the modern day nutritious breakfast, with neuherbs Omega Instant Oats with chia seeds that are filled with health beneficial nutrients. These healthy Omega Oats provides you the nourishment of Oats along with Omega-3 which is sourced from the plant based unroasted Chia Seeds for your better health.

Delivery: Products are usually delivered in 2-5 days.

Offers: 10% Off on all products. Code: EXTRA10

Offers: 15% Off on Orders Above Rs.1499. Code: NEU15

— Key Benefits —

  • Ideal For Managing Blood Sugar Levels

    Being naturally high in soluble fiber & lower in glycemic index, oats helps in stabilizing blood sugar levels

  • Ideal For Managing Weight

    Oats are a source of protein & beta-glucans that helps manage weight & digestion-related issues while you are on a weight loss journey.

  • Ideal For Healthy Heart

    Omega Instant Oats are rich in health beneficial omega-3 sourced from unroasted chia seeds, Omega-3 is known to help you manage blood cholesterol levels

— Key Ingredients —

  • Instant Oats

    To provide you an instant & filling food

  • Zero added sugar

    To deliver a quality food

  • Naturally-gluten free

    For those who are gluten intolerant.

— How To Use —

  • In Breakfast

    Make quickly cooked oatmeal, oats upma, or protein-rich shakes

  • As Evening Snack

    Make Oats Omelette, Oats Chilla or Masala Porridge

  • As Anytime Munching

    Use in baked foods like granola bars, pudding or breads

  • What is the shelf-life of the product?

    neuherbs Omega Instant Oats is best before 12 months from the date of packaging

  • What is the net quantity of this omega Instant oats?

    The net quantity of neuherbs Omega Instant Oats is 400g .

  • Can it be given to children?

    Yes, neuherbs Omega Instant Oats can be enjoyed by children.

  • In what kind of packaging it comes?

    It comes in a monocarton pack with a zip lock poly- pouch to avoid moisture & maintain freshness.

  • Is it gluten-free?

    Yes, neuherbs Omega Instant Oats are naturally glute-free.

  • Is it flavoured?

    No, neuherbs Omega Instant Oats has their own natural taste & doesn't have any added flavour.

  • From which source omega-3 has been extracted?

    Omega-3 has been taken from unroasted chia seeds, which is a natural plant-based source of omega-3.

entry.title: neuherbs Omega Rolled Oats
entry.summary:
Vendor: Neuherbs
Type: Oats
Price: 179.00 - 399.00 (2 variants)

To make your regular breakfast extra nutritious, use Omega neuherbs Rolled Oats with the addition of Omega-3. This rolled oats with omega-3 will help you manage your weight, blood sugar levels and heart health.

Delivery: Products are usually delivered in 2-5 days.

Offers: 10% Off on all products. Code: EXTRA10

Offers: 15% Off on Orders Above Rs.1499. Code: NEU15

— Key Benefits —

  • Helps Manage Weight

    Rich in beta glucans and fiber to help you manage weight

  • Helps Manage Heart Health

    Low in saturated fat, and contains omega-3 that helps manage blood cholesterol & blood pressure levels.

  • Helps Manage Blood Sugar Levels

    Being high in fiber, slows down the absorption of food and help reduce the chances of instant spike of blood sugar levels

— Key Ingredients —

  • Naturally-Gluten Free

    To support your weight management journey

  • Low In Saturated Fat

    To deliver what is best for your heart

  • Zero Added Sugar

    To deliver quality with safety for everyone

— How To Use —

  • For Breakfast

    As a kick-start oatmeal bowl or masala porridge

  • For Lunch

    As oats idli, oats poha, oats dosa, oats chilla and many more

  • For Sweet But Healthy Cravings

    In granola bars, breads and puddings

  • Does it contains omega-3 from a non-veg source?

    No, neuherbs Rolled Oats contains Omega-3 from Flax Seeds that are known to be naturally rich in this healthy nutrient.

  • I am diabetic can I take it?

    Yes, rolled oats are shown to be good for managing blood sugar levels

  • What is its shelf-life?

    neuherbs Rolled oats are best before 9 months from the date of manufacture.

  • Can I use it in making idli, dosa or other south indian dishes?

    Yes, you can easily use these rolled oats for for making south indian recipes according to your taste preference.

  • Does it contain added sugar?

    No, neuherbs Rolled Oats with omega-3 does not contain any added sugar.

  • Is it suitable for kids?

    Yes, it can be enjoyed by children as well.

  • Does it tastes salty?

    No, neuherbs Rolled Oats with Omega-3 is made without any added additives or flavours so it has it's own natural oats taste.
